full_text: Feb-16-2006 02:58pm From- 4 FROM: Dell Riley Kiraly TO: 19547634856 AGE: 005 OF 007 212-371-8042 T-800 P.004/006 F-063 Limitedbrands Victoria's Secret Stores Incident Report VSS2005015562 Printed on:12/13/2006 Investigations Stores Colon verified XBR and found several suspicious returns on 10/30 and 11/2/05 totaling approximately $210.00. During the course of the interview Hall did not admit to any fraudulent refunds. On 11/4/05 RLPM Colon spoke to an associate by the name of Shayna Casdorph and she stated that she observed several items of VSS merchandise in Hall's car one day. The items found were Halo Perfume, tank top, bras, panties and accessories. Findings: Hall resigned at the conclusion of interview and Co-Manager keyed termination as not rehireable for policy violation Loss/Recovery Direct Loss: $0.00 Amount Recovered: $209.00 Net Loss: $0.00 Merchandise Detail: Police Information: Police Officer's Name: Reporting Officer's Badge #: Notes: Evidence: Description: Date/Time: Subjects: Male: Minor: Vehicle Desc: Conditions: Occup/Owner: Drivers: Nickles: Music: Blain* Assigned To: Veltria Oliver: Cotton Employee: Page 3 of 3 This report is the property of Limited Brands and is subject to all confidentiality protections. It may not be duplicated or reproduced without the express written consent of Limited Brands. 07/26/17 Page 80 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031697

text_blocks.content: Limitedbrands Victoria's Secret Stores Incident Report VSS2005015562

Colon verified XBR and found several suspicious returns on 10/30 and 11/2/05 totaling approximately $210.00. During the course of the interview Hall did not admit to any fraudulent refunds. On 11/4/05 RLPM Colon spoke to an associate by the name of Shayna Casdorph and she stated that she observed several items of VSS merchandise in Hall's car one day. The items found were Halo Perfume, tank top, bras, panties and accessories.
Hall resigned at the conclusion of interview and Co-Manager keyed termination as not rehireable for policy violation
This report is the property of Limited Brands and is subject to all confidentiality protections. It may not be duplicated or reproduced without the express written consent of Limited Brands.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned incident report from Victoria's Secret Stores. The report details an investigation into suspicious returns made by an employee named Hall.
